00038   string MappingAndAlignment::getModuleName(UInt_t module_index) const
00039 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00040     throw (range_error,logic_error)
00041 #else
00042     throw (logic_error)
00043 #endif
00044   {
00045 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00046       if (module_index>=_moduleLocationList.size() || _moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()>=_moduleTypeList.size()) {
00047         std::stringstream message;
00048         message << "MappingAndAlignment::getModuleName> Module " << module_index << "is not defined.";
00049         throw range_error(message.str());
00050       }
00051 #endif
00052       if (!isModuleConnected(module_index)) {
00053         std::stringstream message;
00054         message << "MappingAndAlignment::getModuleName> Module " << module_index << "is not connected.";
00055         throw logic_error(message.str());
00056       }
00057       std::stringstream name;
00058       name << "PCB" 
00059            << _moduleLocationList[module_index].first
00060            << "_" << _moduleTypeList[_moduleLocationList[module_index].second.getModuleType()].getModuleTypeName();
00061       return name.str();
00062   }

00065   void MappingAndAlignment::moduleTypeChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col)
00066   {
00067     if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.moduleTypeChanged(): enter"<<endl;
00068     //cellid encoding for the cells in the modules which are descrvied in this collection
00069     _cellIDEncoding=col->getParameters().getStringVal(LCIO::CellIDEncoding); 
00070     Alignment::moduleTypeChanged(col);
00071     rebuildConnectionTree(); 
00072     correctFullHalfConnectorErrors();
00073     determineMaximumCellNumberPerFrontEnd();
00074     if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.moduleTypeChanged(): exit"<<endl;
00075   }

00077   void MappingAndAlignment::moduleLocationChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00078     if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.moduleLocationChanged(): enter"<<endl;
00079     Alignment::moduleLocationChanged(col);
00080     _moduleIndex.clear();
00081     for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_moduleLocationList.size();module_i++) {
00082       const ModuleLocation &location(_moduleLocationList[module_i].second);
00083       _moduleIndex.insert(make_pair(location.getCellIndexOffset(),module_i));
00084     }
00085 
00086     rebuildConnectionTree(); 
00087     correctFullHalfConnectorErrors();
00088     determineMaximumCellNumberPerFrontEnd();
00089     if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.moduleLocationChanged(): exit"<<endl;
00090   }

00092   void MappingAndAlignment::moduleConnectionChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col)
00093   {
00094     if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.moduleConnectionChanged(): enter"<<endl;
00095 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG  
00096     std::cout << "MappingAndAlignment::moduleConnectionChanged>" << std::endl;
00097 #endif    
00098     if (!col) {
00099       throw std::runtime_error("MappingAndAlignment::moduleConnectionChanged> Missing ModuleConnection condditions data. Sorry: don't know the folder name neither the time stamp.");
00100     }
00101 
00102     //    std::cout << "MappingAndAlignment::moduleConnectionChanged>" << std::endl;
00103     _moduleConnectionList.clear();
00104     clearTcmtConnections();
00105     for (UInt_t element_i=0; element_i<(UInt_t) col->getNumberOfElements(); element_i++) {
00106 
00107       LCGenericObject* genObj = (LCGenericObjectImpl*)col->getElementAt(element_i);
00108       if(genObj->getNInt()==7) _moduleConnectionList.push_back(ModuleConnection(col->getElementAt(element_i)));
00109 
00110       // Tcmt connections
00111       if(genObj->getNInt()==5) {
00112         // fill connections map, keyed by elecID (slot,fe,chip,channel)
00113         TcmtConnection* connection = new TcmtConnection(col->getElementAt(element_i));
00114         _tcmtConnectionList.insert( make_pair(connection->getElecID(),connection) );
00115       }
00116 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00117 //       if(genObj->getNInt()==7) {
00118 //      ModuleConnection connection(col->getElementAt(element_i));
00119 //      connection.print(std::cout);
00120 //      std::cout << std::endl;
00121 //       }
00122 //       if(genObj->getNInt()==5) {
00123 //      TcmtConnection connection(col->getElementAt(element_i));
00124 //      connection.print(std::cout);
00125 //      std::cout << std::endl;
00126 //       }
00127 #endif
00128     }
00129     rebuildConnectionTree(); 
00130     correctFullHalfConnectorErrors();
00131     determineMaximumCellNumberPerFrontEnd();
00132     if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.moduleConnectionChanged(): exit"<<endl;
00133   }
00134 
00135   void MappingAndAlignment::rebuildConnectionTree() {
00136     if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.rebuildConnectionTree(): enter"<<endl;
00137     if(debug>0) cout << "MappingAndAlignment::rebuildConnectionTree> list" 
00138               << ", _moduleConnectionList.size=" << _moduleConnectionList.size()
00139               << ", _tcmtConnectionList.size=" << _tcmtConnectionList.size()
00140               << ", _moduleTypeList.size=" << _moduleTypeList.size()
00141               << ", _moduleLocationList.size=" << _moduleLocationList.size() << std::endl;
00142     
00143     _crateList.clear();
00144     if ( isModuleConditionsDataComplete() ) {
00145       if(debug>0) cout<<"ModuleConditionsData is complete"<<endl;
00146 
00147       for(ModuleList_t::iterator location_iter = _moduleLocationList.begin();
00148           location_iter != _moduleLocationList.end();
00149           location_iter++) {
00150         location_iter->first=static_cast<UInt_t>(-1);
00151       }
00152 
00153       if( _tcmtConnectionList.size()>0 ) {
00154         rebuildTcmtConnectionTree();
00155         if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.rebuildConnectionTree(): exit"<<endl;
00156         return;
00157       }
00158 
00159       // here for non-Tcmt connection trees
00160       assert(_moduleConnectionList.size()>0);
00161 
00162       // loop over all connected front-ends
00163       // create a list of crates and slots and front-ends and connect the used front-ends of all the slots
00164       // to modules.
00165       for(ModuleConnectionList_t::const_iterator module_iter = _moduleConnectionList.begin();
00166           module_iter != _moduleConnectionList.end();
00167           module_iter++) {
00168 
00169         ModuleIndex_t::const_iterator module_location_index=_moduleIndex.find(module_iter->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell());
00170         if (module_location_index == _moduleIndex.end() ||
00171             _moduleLocationList[module_location_index->second].second.getModuleType() >= _moduleTypeList.size()) {
00172 
00173           std::stringstream message;
00174           message << "MappingAndAlignment::rebuildConnectionTree> No location defined for module "
00175                   << " id=" << module_iter->getModuleID() << " type=" << (UInt_t) module_iter->getModuleType()
00176                   << " connected to crate/slot/FE/connector: "
00177                   <<        module_iter->getCrate()
00178                   << "/" << module_iter->getSlot()
00179                   << "/" << module_iter->getFrontEnd()
00180                   << "/" << module_iter->getConnectorTypeName();
00181 
00182           throw runtime_error(message.str());
00183         }
00184 
00185         //A map which relates the mokka cell indices to the module index
00186 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00187         //Test
00188         std::cout << "Module Index: " << module_location_index->second << std::endl;
00189         std::cout << "ILC Index: " << std::hex << module_iter->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell() << std::dec << std::endl;
00190 #endif
00191         _mapCelltoModuleIndex.insert(std::make_pair(module_iter->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell(), module_location_index->second)  );
00192 
00193         // Search in the list of crates if a crate with this ID is already registered 
00194         CrateList_t::iterator crate_iter=_crateList.begin();
00195         while (crate_iter!=_crateList.end()) {
00196           if (crate_iter->first==(UInt_t) module_iter->getCrate()) break;
00197           crate_iter++;
00198         }
00199 
00200         SlotList_t *the_slot_list;
00201         if (crate_iter==_crateList.end()) {
00202           // if this crate was not yet registered, then register the crate
00203           _crateList.push_back(make_pair(module_iter->getCrate(),SlotList_t()));
00204           the_slot_list=&(_crateList.back().second);
00205         }
00206         else {
00207           the_slot_list=&(crate_iter->second);
00208         }
00209 
00210         // create a slot list for this crate which is big enough, such that the slot ID can be used as an
00211         // array index.
00212         // It is assumed that the slot ID is a small number and the range from 0 to the maximum slot ID
00213         // is more or less used. Otherwise this would be a huge waste of space!
00214         if (the_slot_list->size()<=(UInt_t) module_iter->getSlot()) the_slot_list->resize(module_iter->getSlot()+1);
00215 
00216         UInt_t front_end_id=module_iter->getFrontEnd()*2 + (module_iter->getConnectorType()%2);
00217         if (module_iter->getConnectorType()>=CALICE::kNConnectorTypes) {
00218           std::stringstream message;
00219           message << "MappingAndAlignment::rebuildConnectionTree>"
00220                   << "Unknown connector type for crate=" << crate_iter->first
00221                   << " slot=" << module_iter->getSlot() 
00222                   << " front-end=" << module_iter->getFrontEnd() 
00223                   << " type id=" << static_cast<UInt_t>(module_iter->getConnectorType())
00224                   << ".";
00225           throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00226         }
00227 
00228         // Verify that the front-end or front-end side does not exceed the considered front-end range 
00229         if (front_end_id>=__nFrontEnds*2) {
00230           std::stringstream message;
00231           message << "MappingAndAlignment::rebuildConnectionTree>"
00232                   << "Front-end ID(" << module_iter->getFrontEnd() 
00233                   <<") are out of range. Only " << __nFrontEnds << "front-ends and 2 sides are handled.";
00234           throw std::logic_error(message.str());
00235         }
00236 
00237         // create a list of "__nFrontEnds * 2 sides" elements to store a module ID to which the front-end 
00238         // is connected. If the front-end is not connected _moduleLocationList.size() is stored instead.
00239         while ((*the_slot_list)[module_iter->getSlot()].size()<=2*__nFrontEnds) {
00240           (*the_slot_list)[module_iter->getSlot()].push_back(getNModules());
00241         }
00242 
00243         // Finally connect the specified front-end to the given module 
00244         (*the_slot_list)[module_iter->getSlot()][front_end_id]=module_location_index->second;
00245 
00246         if (module_iter->getConnectorType()==kFullConnector) {
00247           (*the_slot_list)[module_iter->getSlot()][front_end_id+1]=module_location_index->second;
00248         }
00249         _moduleLocationList[module_location_index->second].first=module_iter->getModuleID();
00250       }
00251 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00252         std::cout << "**************************************************" << std::endl;
00253 #endif
00254 
00255       _nCells=0;
00256       _nConnectedCells=0;
00257       for (ModuleList_t::const_iterator module_iter=_moduleLocationList.begin();
00258            module_iter!=_moduleLocationList.end();
00259            module_iter++) {
00260         UInt_t module_cells=_moduleTypeList[module_iter->second.getModuleType()].getNCells();
00261         _nCells+=module_cells;
00262         if (module_iter->first!=(UInt_t) -1) {
00263           _nConnectedCells+=module_cells;
00264         }
00265       }
00266 
00267       // DEBUG:
00268       if (_viewConnectionTree) print(std::cout);
00269     }
00270     if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.rebuildConnectionTree(): exit"<<endl;
00271   }
00272 
00273   void MappingAndAlignment::rebuildTcmtConnectionTree() {
00274     // only called when all conditions data is complete
00275     if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.rebuildTcmtConnectionTree(): enter"<<endl;
00276     assert( isModuleConditionsDataComplete() );
00277     assert( _tcmtConnectionList.size()>0 );
00278 
00279     // loop over all connected strips and connect each strip to an
00280     // electronic channel
00281     for(TcmtConnectionList_t::const_iterator module_iter = _tcmtConnectionList.begin();
00282         module_iter != _tcmtConnectionList.end();
00283         module_iter++) {
00284 
00285       TcmtConnection* connection = module_iter->second;
00286       ModuleIndex_t::const_iterator module_location_index=_moduleIndex.find(connection->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell());
00287       if (module_location_index == _moduleIndex.end() ||
00288           _moduleLocationList[module_location_index->second].second.getModuleType() >= _moduleTypeList.size()) {
00289 
00290         std::stringstream message;
00291         message << "MappingAndAlignment::rebuildTcmtConnectionTree> No location defined for module "
00292                 << " id=" << connection->getModuleID() << " type=" << (UInt_t) connection->getModuleType()
00293                 << " connected to crate/slot/FE: "
00294                 <<        connection->getCrate()
00295                 << "/" << connection->getSlot()
00296                 << "/" << connection->getFrontEnd();
00297 
00298         throw runtime_error(message.str());
00299       }
00300 
00301       //A map which relates the mokka cell indices to the module index
00302 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00303       //Test
00304       int tmpLayer = (connection->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell() >> 24);
00305       std::cout << "Location Index: " << module_location_index->second <<", layer="<< tmpLayer << std::endl;
00306       std::cout << "ILC Index: " << std::hex << connection->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell() << std::dec << std::endl;
00307 #endif
00308       _mapCelltoModuleIndex.insert(std::make_pair(connection->getIndexOfLowerLeftCell(), module_location_index->second)  );
00309 
00310       // Search in the list of crates if a crate with this ID is already registered 
00311       CrateList_t::iterator crate_iter=_crateList.begin();
00312       while (crate_iter!=_crateList.end()) {
00313         if (crate_iter->first==(UInt_t) connection->getCrate()) break;
00314         crate_iter++;
00315       }
00316 
00317       SlotList_t *the_slot_list;
00318       if (crate_iter==_crateList.end()) {
00319         // if this crate was not yet registered, then register the crate
00320         _crateList.push_back(make_pair(connection->getCrate(),SlotList_t()));
00321         the_slot_list=&(_crateList.back().second);
00322       }
00323       else {
00324         the_slot_list=&(crate_iter->second);
00325       }
00326 
00327       _moduleLocationList[module_location_index->second].first = connection->getModuleID();
00328     }
00329 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00330     std::cout << "**************************************************" << std::endl;
00331 #endif
00332 
00333     _nCells=0;
00334     _nConnectedCells=0;
00335     for (ModuleList_t::const_iterator module_iter=_moduleLocationList.begin();
00336          module_iter!=_moduleLocationList.end();
00337          module_iter++) {
00338       UInt_t module_cells=_moduleTypeList[module_iter->second.getModuleType()].getNCells();
00339       _nCells+=module_cells;
00340       if (module_iter->first!=(UInt_t) -1) {
00341         _nConnectedCells+=module_cells;
00342       }
00343     }
00344 
00345     // DEBUG:
00346     if (_viewConnectionTree) printTcmtConnections(std::cout);
00347 
00348     if(debug>0) cout<<"MapAndAlign.rebuildTcmtConnectionTree(): exit"<<endl;
00349   }
00350 
00351   Int_t MappingAndAlignment::getModuleIndexFromCellIndex(UInt_t cellindex) {
00352      //first maskout the relevant Mokka indices K (layer number) and M (for the SiW Ecal, Wafer Row)
00353     UInt_t lookupindex = ( ((cellindex & MASK_M) -1) | (cellindex & MASK_K) );
00354 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00355     std::cout << "Lookup Index: " << std::hex << lookupindex << std::dec << std::endl;
00356 #endif
00357     MapCelltoModuleIndex_t::iterator map_iter = _mapCelltoModuleIndex.find(lookupindex);
00358     //if we have found the module_index. fine - Return it  
00359     if ( map_iter != _mapCelltoModuleIndex.end()) return map_iter->second;
00360 
00361     //if not we might be still one or more rows above
00362     //the one containing the index of the lower left cell, so keep on reducing the
00363     //row index
00364     UInt_t isearch(0);
00365     UInt_t testindex(0); 
00366     //Loop until we find an index;
00367     while ( map_iter == _mapCelltoModuleIndex.end() ) {
00368       isearch++;
00369       Int_t m_index = static_cast<Int_t>(( (cellindex & MASK_M) >> SHIFT_M) - isearch - 1); 
00370       if(m_index < 0) {
00371         stringstream message;
00372         message << "MappingAndAlignment::getModuleIndexFromCellIndex:Index of lower left cell not found"; 
00373         message << "for mokka index " << cellindex << std::endl; 
00374         throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00375       }
00376       testindex = (static_cast<UInt_t>(m_index) << SHIFT_M) | (cellindex & MASK_K) ;
00377 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00378     std::cout << "Test Index: " << std::hex << testindex << std::dec << std::endl;
00379 #endif
00380       map_iter = _mapCelltoModuleIndex.find(testindex);
00381       
00382     }
00383 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00384     std::cout << "Before second return: " << std::endl;
00385 #endif
00386     return map_iter->second;
00387 }

00390   void MappingAndAlignment::print(std::ostream &os) {
00391     os << "Module types:" << std::endl;
00392     for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_moduleTypeList.size(); module_i++) {
00393       if (_moduleTypeList[module_i].getModuleType() != UCHAR_MAX) { 
00394         if (!_moduleTypeList[module_i].isValid()) continue;
00395         os << module_i << ":"
00396            << _moduleTypeList[module_i].getModuleTypeName()
00397            << " type="  << _moduleTypeList[module_i].getModuleType()
00398            << " width="  << _moduleTypeList[module_i].getWidth()
00399            << " height="  << _moduleTypeList[module_i].getHeight()
00400            << " n_cells=" << _moduleTypeList[module_i].getNCells();
00401         //      if (!_moduleTypeList[module_i].hasCellDimensionsPerCell()) {   
00402         //      os << " cell width="  << _moduleTypeList[module_i].getCellWidth()
00403         //         << " cell height="  << _moduleTypeList[module_i].getCellHeight();
00404         //   
00405         os << std::endl;
00406         for (UInt_t cell_i=0; cell_i<_moduleTypeList[module_i].getNCells(); cell_i++) {
00407           os << "\t" 
00408              << std::setw(10) << _moduleTypeList[module_i].getCellXPos(cell_i) 
00409              << std::setw(10) <<  _moduleTypeList[module_i].getCellYPos(cell_i)
00410              << std::endl;
00411         }     
00412       }
00413     }
00414     os << std::endl; 
00415     os << "Module Locations:" << std::endl;
00416     for (UInt_t module_i=0; module_i<_moduleLocationList.size(); module_i++) {
00417       if (isModuleConnected(module_i)) {
00418         os << module_i << " id=" << _moduleLocationList[module_i].first << " ";
00419         _moduleLocationList[module_i].second.print(os);
00420       }
00421       else {
00422         os << module_i << " (not connected) ";
00423         _moduleLocationList[module_i].second.print(os);
00424       }
00425     }
00426     os << std::endl;
00427     os << "Connection Tree:" << std::endl;
00428     for (CrateList_t::const_iterator crate_iter=_crateList.begin();
00429          crate_iter!=_crateList.end();
00430          crate_iter++) {
00431       os << "Crate=" << crate_iter->first << std::endl;
00432       for (UInt_t slot_i=0; slot_i<crate_iter->second.size(); slot_i++) {
00433         if (crate_iter->second[slot_i].size()>0) {
00434           os << "Slot=" << slot_i << std::endl;
00435           for (UInt_t fe_i=0; fe_i<crate_iter->second[slot_i].size(); fe_i++) {
00436             os << "fe=" << fe_i/2 << " side" << fe_i%2 << " " ;
00437             if (crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i]<_moduleLocationList.size()) {
00438               os << " module=" << crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i]
00439                  << " id="  << _moduleLocationList[crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i]].first;
00440               if ( _moduleLocationList[crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i]].second.getModuleType()<=_moduleTypeList.size()) {
00441                 os << " type=" << (int) _moduleLocationList[crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i]].second.getModuleType();
00442               }
00443               else {
00444                 os << "** module type does not exist ** ";
00445               }
00446               os << std::endl;
00447             }
00448             else {
00449               os << "Not connected." << std::endl;
00450             }
00451           }
00452         }
00453       }
00454     }
00455   }
00456 
00457   void MappingAndAlignment::determineMaximumCellNumberPerFrontEnd() 
00458   {
00459     if ( isModuleConditionsDataComplete() ) {
00460       _maxNCells=0;
00461       for (CrateList_t::const_iterator crate_iter=_crateList.begin();
00462            crate_iter!=_crateList.end();
00463            crate_iter++) {
00464         for (UInt_t slot_i=0; slot_i<crate_iter->second.size(); slot_i++) {
00465           if (crate_iter->second[slot_i].size()>0) {
00466 
00467             for (UInt_t fe_i=0; fe_i+1<crate_iter->second[slot_i].size(); fe_i+=2) {
00468               UInt_t n_cells[2]={0,0};
00469               UInt_t last_module_index=_moduleLocationList.size();
00470               for (UInt_t side_i=0; side_i<2; side_i++) {
00471                 UInt_t eff_fe_i=fe_i+side_i;
00472                 if (crate_iter->second[slot_i][eff_fe_i]<_moduleLocationList.size()) {
00473                   UInt_t module_index=crate_iter->second[slot_i][eff_fe_i];
00474                   UInt_t module_type_i=_moduleLocationList[crate_iter->second[slot_i][eff_fe_i]].second.getModuleType();
00475                   if ( module_type_i < _moduleTypeList.size()) {
00476                     if (side_i==0 || module_index != last_module_index) {
00477                       n_cells[side_i]=_moduleTypeList[ module_type_i ].getNCells();
00478                     }
00479                   }
00480                   last_module_index=module_index;
00481                 }
00482               }
00483               if (n_cells[1]>0) {
00484                 // if there is a  left side
00485                 // then the maximum number of cells is 
00486                 // defined large enough such that half of the buffer which is set to the maximum cell size 
00487                 // will be large enough to fit the cells of the right and the left side.
00488                 if (n_cells[0]*2>_maxNCells) {
00489                   _maxNCells=n_cells[0]*2;
00490                 }
00491                 if (n_cells[1]*2>_maxNCells) {
00492                   _maxNCells=n_cells[0]*2;
00493                 }
00494               }
00495               else {
00496                 // if there is only the right side
00497                 if (n_cells[0]>_maxNCells) {
00498                   _maxNCells=n_cells[0];
00499                 }
00500               }
00501             }
00502           }
00503         }
00504       }
00505     }
00506   }
00507 
00508 
00509   void MappingAndAlignment::correctFullHalfConnectorErrors() 
00510   {
00511     if (_moduleTypeList.size()==0) {
00512       // No modules type have been defined yet cannot guess the required connector type (full/half).
00513       return;
00514     }
00515     //    bool changed_something=false;
00516     for (CrateList_t::iterator crate_iter=_crateList.begin();
00517          crate_iter!=_crateList.end();
00518          crate_iter++) {
00519       for (UInt_t slot_i=0; slot_i<crate_iter->second.size(); slot_i++) {
00520         if (crate_iter->second[slot_i].size()>0) {
00521           for (UInt_t fe_i=0; fe_i<crate_iter->second[slot_i].size(); fe_i+=2) {
00522             if (isModule(crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i])) {
00523               if (_moduleLocationList[crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i]].second.getModuleType()>=_moduleTypeList.size()) {
00524                 std::cerr << "Unknown module type connected to crate " << crate_iter->first
00525                           << " slot=" << slot_i << " fe=" << fe_i << std::endl;
00526                 continue;
00527               }
00528               const ModuleDescription &module_type=_moduleTypeList[_moduleLocationList[crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i]].second.getModuleType()];
00529 
00530               bool module_probably_needs_full_connector=( ( module_type.getNCells() >108) ? true : false); 
00531               if (isModule(crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i+1])) {
00532                 if (module_probably_needs_full_connector && crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i+1] != crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i]) {
00533                   std::cerr << "ERROR::Module type \"" << module_type.getModuleTypeName() << "\" (" << module_type.getNCells()
00534                             << " cells), which is connected to crate " << crate_iter->first
00535                             << " slot=" << slot_i << " fe=" << fe_i/2
00536                             << ", probably has a full connector), But, a second module is connected to the right side of the front-end. " << std::endl;
00537                   // FIXME: throw exception?
00538                 }
00539 
00540               }
00541               else {
00542                 if (module_probably_needs_full_connector) {
00543                   std::cerr << "WARNING::Module type \"" << module_type.getModuleTypeName() << "\" (" << module_type.getNCells()
00544                             << " cells) is connected to the left side of crate " << crate_iter->first
00545                             << " slot=" << slot_i << " fe=" << fe_i/2
00546                             << ", but probably it has a full connector. ** Will assume that a full connector was meant!" << std::endl;
00547                   crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i+1]=crate_iter->second[slot_i][fe_i];
00548                   //              changed_something=true;
00549                 }
00550               }
00551             }
00552           }
00553         }
00554       }
00555     }
00556     //    if (changed_something) {
00557     //  print(std::cout);
00558     //    }
00559 
00560   }
00561 
00562   void MappingAndAlignment::clearTcmtConnections() {
00563     if(_tcmtConnectionList.size()>0) {
00564       for(TcmtConnectionList_t::iterator iter = _tcmtConnectionList.begin(); iter!=_tcmtConnectionList.end(); ++iter) {
00565         if(iter->second) delete iter->second;
00566       }
00567     }
00568     _tcmtConnectionList.clear();
00569   }
00570 
00571   const TcmtConnection* MappingAndAlignment::getTcmtConnection(UInt_t crate, UInt_t slot, UInt_t fe, UInt_t chip, UInt_t channel) const {
00572     TcmtConnection tmp;
00573     tmp.setSlot(slot)
00574       .setFrontEnd(fe)
00575       .setChip(chip)
00576       .setChannel(channel);
00577 
00578     TcmtConnectionList_t::const_iterator iter = _tcmtConnectionList.find( tmp.getElecID() );
00579     if(iter!=_tcmtConnectionList.end()) {
00580       if((UInt_t)iter->second->getCrate() == crate) return iter->second;
00581       else {
00582         std::stringstream message("MappingAndAlignment::getTcmtConnection> multiple Tcmt crates: ");
00583         message << iter->second->getCrate() <<" and "<< crate <<".";
00584         throw std::runtime_error( message.str() );
00585       }
00586     }
00587     else return NULL;
00588   }
00589 
00590   void MappingAndAlignment::printTcmtConnections(std::ostream &os) {
00591     os<<"\n***** TCMT Connection tree: "<< _tcmtConnectionList.size() << " strips." << endl;
00592     os<<" crate/slot/fe/chip/chan  (elecID) -> (fastID) layer/cass/strip/type  cellIDoffset"
00593       << endl;
00594     for(TcmtConnectionList_t::const_iterator iconn=_tcmtConnectionList.begin(); iconn!=_tcmtConnectionList.end(); ++iconn) {
00595       os<< *(iconn->second) << endl;
00596     }
00597   }
00598 
00599   bool MappingAndAlignment::isValidCrate(UInt_t crate) const {
00600     // Search for this crate in the list of crates
00601     for( CrateList_t::const_iterator icrate=_crateList.begin(); icrate!=_crateList.end(); ++icrate) {
00602       if( icrate->first == crate )  return true;
00603     }
00604     return false;
00605   }
00606 }
